metadata.title: CVE-2024-22912 on Ubuntu 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: A global-buffer-overflow was found in SWFTools v0.9.2, in the functioncountline at swf5compiler.flex:327. It allows an attacker to cause codeexecution.

criterions.comment: swftools: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
